thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 3 of 62
thread.title: Lori Ann Reese
thread.title_full: Templatemonster reviewed by Lori Ann Reese

author: Lori Ann Reese
title: Lori Ann Reese
text:
WordPress themes go wrong... we know this. And wading through code problems is difficult. But the staff at TemplateMonster are UNBELIEVABLE! So helpful. So patient and great at issue resolving. Thank you Elina and George for going beyond... to help with the theme that wasn't totally kosher. You reminded me why I only buy my themes from Templatemonster.
Thank you so much!
Lori A. Reese
Brand Manager
Social Me Multimedia
